## Load libraries

```{r load libraries}
## load {readr} and {dplyr} 
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

## Import data

```{r import data}
## read data
ge_imports <- read_csv(paste0(here::here(), "/data/ge_imports.csv"))
ge_exports <- read_csv(paste0(here::here(), "/data/ge_imports.csv"))

## rename columns
ge_imports <- ge_imports %>%  rename(imports_usd = amount_usd)
ge_exports <- ge_exports %>%  rename(exports_usd = amount_usd)

## join data
ge_trade <- ge_imports %>% 
  full_join(ge_exports)
```
